website_summaries.verdict: A budget selfie light with limited extra features.
pros: It's affordable and easy to use with three effective light settings
It's small, which makes it very convenient and portable
It also boasts a rechargeable battery
cons: It's difficult to fit over thick phone cases and the rechargeable battery doesn't last very long

customer_reviews.title: Selfie Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: Great product and works as described. Light has 3 settings that gradually get brighter as you click the power button. Definitely makes a difference in your pics.
customer_reviews.author: eryckahvii

customer_reviews.title: Magic
customer_reviews.text: This light works wonders. The light doesn't have much distance on it so it really is limited to close range pictures, but it makes the world of difference! This is a before and after. The only difference is the light- no editing!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Use it as fill light for awesome selfies!
customer_reviews.text: I don't use this to light photos in very low light, I use it to add flattering light to my selfies. As a 47 year old woman I need to take photos strategically--in light that doesn't make me want to hurl my phone against the wall when I view photos of myself. 🤣 This light helps. A lot. I've added edited and unedited selfies with the light. I have a wallet style case and clip this to the side of my phone on the flip out cover that holds my credit cards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was the best $14 I have ever spent
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box it was easy to use and I was taking amazing pictures with my iPhone like I never had before. Look at that cute dog! Aren't you dying to boop his snoot!? This ring light made this picture! A lot of power in a tiny package; it's easy to slip into my purse or pocket and I take it with me everywhere my phone goes so I'm always ready to grab the perfect shot. Love it! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Allison C.

customer_reviews.title: Very bright light
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this product and when I opened it it did not disappoint! The light is extremely bright which is exactly what I need for my eyeshadow pictures. It fit perfect on my iPhone too.
customer_reviews.author: yazmin

customer_reviews.title: Selfie life
customer_reviews.text: Good quality fast shipping I got it because I drive a mobile boutique and I'm always taking selfies in the van but they always come out too dark not anymore thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: POISONED Pink

customer_reviews.title: Fire hazard!
customer_reviews.text: For starters, you basically have to charge this anytime you want to use it. I wantes to use mine tonight so i was charging it in my office. I just happened to walk into my office and this was smoking on my desk. Almost caughg my office on fire!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Might be dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Used this light periodically for the last month and a half. The battery life seemed great. It finally began dimming and I plugged it in to charge. Immediately I could smell something buring, like the smell of plastic and metal heating up. I unplugged it immediately. The light smells like it's been burned from the inside and I definitely won't be trying to charge this thing again. Don't waste your money on something that seems like it could be a fire hazard.
customer_reviews.author: GeminiFeed

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, and does the job
customer_reviews.text: I had previously ordered a different ring light from a different company, and it was damaged on arrival. This was my replacement, and it's great! The only downside is being blinded by the light. Pictures and videos are much improved by this little light. Also convenient that it can be recharged.
customer_reviews.author: In Demand

customer_reviews.title: YouTube product review: Sonya86 All-Around-Look
customer_reviews.text: You can watch my Full Product Review video on YouTube: @ Sonyas' All-Around-Look Auxiwa Clip on Selfie Ring Light [Rechargeable Battery] with 36 LED For Smart Phone Camera Round Shape, White!
customer_reviews.author: Sonyas' All-Around-Look

customer_reviews.title: Feel like a Celebrity!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Has 3 settings. Very light and easy to work. **UPDATE** This product helped so much last week when my power went out and I had to get ready in the dark! I just clipped this little baby onto my makeup stand, turned my iPhone flashlight on and BAM, my whole bathroom was LIT!! I was ready to party like it was 1999, but I had to get ready for work, total bummer. In fact, I checked my makeup once I arrived at work and my coverage was flawless and you know, your girls highlight was on FLEEK!
customer_reviews.author: ANT

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love the rechargeable feature! The light is perfect, especially since there are three options! I use it on and off everyday for photos and lighting when I do my makeup. Charged it once and it hasn't need another charge for about a week now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Like It && I Can't Complain
customer_reviews.text: I like this ring light to me it does what it says && I can't complain. However, I do prefer a case that lights up because it's more convenient and don't have you scrambling looking for a ring light.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleymarie

customer_reviews.title: This is great! It's very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is great! It's very easy to use, as all you need to do is snap it onto your phone on the top. It's very easy to put on and take off. It makes your picture look great.
customer_reviews.author: S. Chan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 11yr old daughter, she loves it.. really enhances your selfies
customer_reviews.author: jen b

customer_reviews.title: I love that there are three settings
customer_reviews.text: OH MY GOODNESS! I am obsessed! I bought these for gifts for two of my teammates- but I'm keeping one for myself and ordering more. I was seriously shocked at how bright the lights are! I love that there are three settings. I compared it to my expensive ring light- and for the price and the size of this- its so perfect! Very Happy with this order!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Jane

customer_reviews.title: Lights Camera Action
customer_reviews.text: Great product...easy clip on. I’m a freelance Makeup Artist ...will be using on clients. Nice soft white light. Really forgiving in photos. Perfect and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice light; could be brighter
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice ring light for the price & size...I wish it was a little brighter. It does have different brightness settings, but just not as bright as I'd like.
customer_reviews.author: Jeepsy Soul

customer_reviews.title: Best selfie ring
customer_reviews.text: This is the best selfie ring, I did a lot of research before buying and I have to say I have no regrets, I ended up buying one for my mum and my little sister as well
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Hamana Maza

customer_reviews.title: Illuminate yourself with this wonderful gadget! I freaking love this lighting
customer_reviews.text: GAME CHANGER!! Illuminate yourself with this wonderful gadget! I freaking love this lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Joanzy

customer_reviews.title: Not a camera, does not "face recognize"
customer_reviews.text: The item you are seeing is a face clip mirror to use make up or just give more light in a dark room. this is not a "smart selfie ring." The idea isn't bad, but the product sure is.
customer_reviews.author: si.yrxkrru1t3177Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly bright, and it has multiple settings. This is a great product, it comes with a USB charging cord so no pesky batteries.
customer_reviews.author: photorockr

customer_reviews.title: Too Bright!
customer_reviews.text: I got a few of these as stocking stuffers for my friends. They love taking selfies so I figured this would be perfect. It does work as intended, but even the lowest setting is a bit too bright, which ends up washing out the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Olea

customer_reviews.title: great for makeup
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this for makeup when I travel. It clips onto the travel mirror I bring, so I can do my makeup in less than ideal lighting without messing up. Works great for this!
customer_reviews.author: Dolly Leigh

customer_reviews.title: I'm deaddddd😍
customer_reviews.text: This. Is. A. Total. Game. Changer. WHERE HAS THIS BEEN ALL MY LIFE?! I'm in love, seriously order it right now you need it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: koolkidzmom

customer_reviews.title: Yes!!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously love this, I didn't know but there are THREE different bright light settings & they are all so great!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: I was scared!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I got over the fear of buying this. It has three settings and YES it does get bright. I was not disappoint at all. Already told my friends
customer_reviews.author: Detroit-Beauty, View

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, but stops charging
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this selfie light. It has three settings and made the lighting Soo much better. Sadly it charged for two weeks and then just stopped. Probablt just got a defective one. Because the other reviews they worked wonderful. I'll I probably buy another one months later. Only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Asha

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done wich is spread light nice and strong
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done wich is spread light nice and strong. About the soft jelly so you don't scratch the screen... they work not so well, it detached from the ring the second time i used it, but nothing that crazy glue couldn't fix.
customer_reviews.author: Alahin Lucart

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Stays charged a very long time and the different settings really help you get the perfect picture.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It makes my photos looks so much better. There are three different settings to chanve the level of brightness. My pictures looks so much more better quality now that I have purchased this little selfie light.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Warbux

customer_reviews.title: A perfect lighting solution.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a neat light, and I love how you can charge it via usb. It holds a charge for a couple of hours of continuous use! Perfect for low-lighting situations.
customer_reviews.author: Liam B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Makes my pics look so glam
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Makes my pics look so glam. Also use it when facetiming at night and I don't want to cut the lights on lol. Has 3 settings
customer_reviews.author: Toya N

customer_reviews.title: Not effective...waste of money because you won't be able to tell a difference
customer_reviews.text: Item just arrived. Tried it... and it is completely useless!! Really wanted it to work but it is a waste of money. Tried taking several before and after photos of some friends and no one could tell the difference. The product feels super cheap like it will last a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase !
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this light 2 weeks ago, and for the price I was surprised with how good the product was. There are 3 brightness settings, and it's very easy to use. It comes with a charger, and it lasts long throughout the day. Highly recommend for better photos! It gives a natural light effect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Like a Charm!
customer_reviews.text: The price was low so I wasn't expecting miracles but it has saved our iPhone shots from bad lighting on every use. Charge lasts us a whole 8-hour day of filming and I was worried it might not fit the iPhone 7 Plus, but works like a charm! Very happy with this little gem!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Niccole

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. I haven't even had to charge it yet.

customer_reviews.text: I haven't really used it all that much but it is exactly what it is promised. Three bright settings and it easily clips onto your phone!

customer_reviews.text: This is a great product!! Great light!! Small cloudy film around the picture when i have my phone cover on. Overall it is a great buy!! Lights for a long period of time.

customer_reviews.title: Just like a professional photo, Love this.
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I took this with my iPhone 7, I put it on the brightest, and it really is the perfect lighting.it helps it you have a good phone that takes quality pictures, it makes your photos come out even nicer with this light! I love the fact that I can clip it on my mac book if I want to as well. This arrived super fast, I live in NYC and it took only 2 days to receive. I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Overdressed.Undercaffinated

customer_reviews.title: Great Battery Life!
customer_reviews.text: I work for a 501-C3 (Show Me Shoes Foundation) and we had an event over the weekend. Everyone loved the light. I personally liked the variation in the degree of lighting and the battery life. There was no flickering of light or power reduction.

customer_reviews.title: Love this light
customer_reviews.text: I love the three different light settings. It works perfect for what I needed it for when lighting is not as bright as wanted to photos. This brings in the perfect lighting.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this! Highly recommend for your phone or computer for videos and pictures!

customer_reviews.title: everything was great except the charging cable is a bit too short
customer_reviews.text: everything was great except the charging cable is a bit too short. 3 level brightness is great. If you wear eye glasses, be warned, there will be reflections when selfie. Now I am waiting for my nice selfie stick to see if this will be compatible.

customer_reviews.text: PERFECT! Bought it for my wife and she loves it. The 3 different settings make it great and quality build.

customer_reviews.title: Great for my before and after lash extension pictures
customer_reviews.text: Love it for my before and after pictures. All my clients love this. I've been using it for two weeks now. No problems so far. I love how it's rechargeable and has different levels of brightness. I use it on my iPhone 6 Plus. I can easily clip it on to take pictures on either side of the camera. I'll definitely be getting a second one just in case this one dies on me. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Meissa

customer_reviews.title: Not as bright as I thought it would be. ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as bright as I thought it would be. Usually use it when there's no sunlight and I have my bedroom lights on.

customer_reviews.title: Very bright!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this product is amazing! Does exactly what I hoped it would do.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Oh I love this selfie ring!! So glad I bought it!!!

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Selfie Ring Light Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the silliest but potentially greatest thing I've purchased through Amazon. I've kept this ring light in whatever bag I take and it's GREAT for selfies in low-light. Instantly brightens and enhances photos. I have an iPhone 6s Plus and it fits perfectly over my camera lense. I have also used it with an iPad. Battery lasts forever but the charger is super handy when it comes time to recharge. 10/10!
customer_reviews.author: Breezewell

customer_reviews.title: This is fun to use
customer_reviews.text: This is fun to use! I like how you can adjust the brightness. It definitely adds something to your photos. Not a bad price either.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great for weekend trips in lieu of professional lighting equipment
customer_reviews.text: Love this selfie ring light! This is perfect to take on weekend trips because my iPhone 7 takes great photos, and adding this light to it helps to replace with lighting I would normally use. Great purchase for bloggers/vloggers.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany C.

customer_reviews.title: I love this selfie light
customer_reviews.text: I love this selfie light. it has three settings and is rechargeable so i dont have to fuss with batteries. it clips onto my phone easily and is sturdy. my only issue is that i find it dies quickly. the third setting is bright enough to serve as a fill light for filming beauty videos, which for a tutorial takes me forty minutes on average. i find that even with a full charge, it is dull by a half hour of use. other than that, for a quick five to ten minute selfie session, it's perfect
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Mini Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: Like a lot of us, I've been working from home lately. This little light has been a huge help during the constant Zooms and Google Meets. I didn't want to buy a big elaborate ring light with a tripod, so I decided to give this a try. It's awesome. Obviously it's not going to give you the same effect as a bigger, more expensive setup. But for the size and price, I'm pretty impressed. I just clip it right onto my laptop and it works like a charm. Definitely worth it if you're looking for something more portable and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Thrower

customer_reviews.title: ⚡️ Sparkly eyes and better skin with less shadows ❇️ ✨
customer_reviews.text: Apologize for the hideous pictures/selfie but the ring light makes a huge difference in filling in shadows and making the eyes pop. I purchased this for my daughter who is in high school with all the lame zoom virtual classes it makes her feel fancy... I recommend it if all the larger ones are sold out or too expensive...it’s small but effective enough for a phone or laptop to be used for zoo... and selfies! Who doesn’t want to look less gross and old right?
customer_reviews.author: Sara J

customer_reviews.title: Great price & quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use! I love that it just clips onto my phone. Great quality light for what I use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Cheatham

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! My only complaint (and it is not their fault) is the way it sits on my phone - I have to set everything up to take a photo first, because the camera app is difficult to get into and operate once the light ring is attached.
customer_reviews.author: tazzygirl

customer_reviews.title: Great for so many things!
customer_reviews.text: I learned about this product from my nail tech who likes to take pictures of her clients' nails, using her phone, when she's through. Recently I've been going through my father in law's old photos, using my phone to take pictures of the pictures. I LOVE having this to help me through the process. It's sooo nice not to have to deal with shadows on the photos caused by overhead lighting, and not having to scan each photo for a 'clean' image. Another thing I love about this is that it enables me to take pictures that require more lighting than the phone will allow me to set. Overall, I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: BlithelyBookishReviews

customer_reviews.title: it doesn't hold its charge
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my virtual tutoring job because the reviews are good. Either I got a defective product, or this just don't work, I don't know. I fully charge it before using and it will only be very bright for about 5 minutes and the brightness will then start to diminish. The only way I can maintain the most bright light is when I have it plugged in directly to my laptop while teaching. I can't even use it on my phone because of brightness issue.! I decided to return because it is a waste of my $16 and my time!
customer_reviews.author: Glai

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty amazing what this little light can do! It’s helped me with my live Facebook videos. It has 3 lighting options And all you have to do is press the button 3 times and you can pick which lighting is best. Not expensive and it fits on my iPhone 7 Plus as well as my Mac. Loved it! Definitely Would work great to apply makeup on the go if I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Siara Marie

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice!
customer_reviews.text: So nice! It's super simple to use, I love the different light settings available, and it charges pretty fast. All around, it's something that I'm really pleased with!
customer_reviews.author: Julia KarenTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat works with iPhone 11 pro. See review
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and I’ve only had it two days and love it. I’m going to be using this for my business and it will be perfect. I have the new IPhone Pro and it fits good however, the third camera is covered up by the light frame of you have the light facing away from you. It does not cover anything up when you have the light facing you for selfies. The third camera is for the extreme zoom so I won’t be needing it for what I’m doing anyway. It’s super bright but doesn’t look unnatural. The first pic is the highest setting and the second pic is natural light.
customer_reviews.author: chandra

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product couldn’t be more easy to use. It comes in a box with a cable to charge it. It has 3 different brightness settings that you can adjust by clicking a button on the back of it. The lowest setting is usually plenty bright for me. I do wish there was more of a softer yellowish light option, but other than that, I am very happy with this product! It doesn’t have a very long battery life but it hasn’t been a problem for me. I just plug it into my computer at night to charge it and it’s ready for the next day. I have had 2 people comment on how great my makeup looks since using it.
customer_reviews.author: alewis1227

customer_reviews.title: Do you really need this??
customer_reviews.text: YES YOU DO! Lol. I am not a selfie chic. I don’t know my best angle and I don’t really care about that. But when I do take pictures, I want what is seen in person to be what is seen on cam. This selfie illuminator is EVERYTHING! It’s very easy to use. Just clip it on and press the on button. There are 3 light settings, I used #2. The most difficult thing about this light is remembering to take it with you. :). I’m very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do much
customer_reviews.text: The product physically works but doesn't seem to enhance my lighting at all unfortunately. Seems like a waste of money tho a cool idea
customer_reviews.author: Shira Katz

customer_reviews.title: Laptop Video
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my laptop to give me better lighting for when I video teach kids in China. I love it so much I bought a second one. They are super bright and perfect! I love that it is rechargeable.
customer_reviews.author: Emily A.

customer_reviews.title: Helps take really great selfies!
customer_reviews.text: Helps take really great selfies! I like turning off all of the house lights and using this light to get professional looking lighting. :)
customer_reviews.author: Thea Gillera

customer_reviews.title: Great light. Gives of the perfect amount of light ...
customer_reviews.text: Great light. Gives of the perfect amount of light with three different options. I used this light for photos and for Facebook Live video. It's great and fits perfectly on my iphone 6. Super affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two ring lights when this one was backordered and I wanted to be sure I had a ring lamp by a certain date. This is the one I will keep. The other, GLOUE Selfie Light Ring Led Circle Clip-on Selfie Fill Light with 36 Led Bubbles USB Rechargeable Portable for iPhone Smart Phones, Pads, Makeup Mirrors-Black 1 Pack, is a knockoff. The Gloue does not hold a charge very long (20 - 30 minutes in my first two tests). Failure to make it through a Zoom meeting is not acceptable for me. The kelvin on this lamp is warmer, giving flesh a more natural look.
customer_reviews.author: LeeMKE

customer_reviews.title: I looked like a troll under a bridge--dark circles under my eyes
customer_reviews.text: To say that this light has changed my life is an understatement. Before I started using it, I looked like a troll under a bridge--dark circles under my eyes, haggard face, sallow skin, the works. Now, my skin is bright and I practically have a halo on my head. Huge win. I've recommended this to everyone I know, literally--everyone.
customer_reviews.author: E.Rich

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this to help provide some additional light during ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to help provide some additional light during Facebook live videos that I was conducting indoors, mostly at night. However, you have to be extremely close to your phone in order for it to provide any noticeable light. Settings two and three are so bright that they would be hard to look at for any length of time. The ring also would have gotten in the way of me being able to see viewer comments during the live video as well. I guess if you're just going to pull it out for a quick selfie at close-up range, then it does the trick. But if you're thinking of using it for video, I'd advise against it.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian R Owen

customer_reviews.title: I’m sure this light is great for selfies but for anything more than a few ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure this light is great for selfies but for anything more than a few inches from your face it’s useless
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a perfect solution for video calls
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for zoom calls, as I’m often seated with a window behind me, making my face in shadow. It’s not as good for that purpose as I had hoped. It does add light and helps, but it’s an odd, unnatural light, like a picture taken with flash, and doesn’t make as big of a difference as I expected. It’s hard on the eyes to have it on through a whole video call. You will see a purple ring of light everywhere you look for awhile after turning it off. It’s probably better for it’s main intended use of just taking selfies.
customer_reviews.author: Party of Six

customer_reviews.title: Super bright. Makes great selfies.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how bright this thing gets and it seems to hold a charge forever. It clips easily onto any phone and has three different brightness settings. It really makes a difference in the selfie.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Simple light for videos
customer_reviews.text: Product was shipped quickly and arrived on time. Product arrived as described. Every thing works great! I've used it several times already and have had no issues. I can honestly say I'll keep using this here on and it's simple and easy to use. I use this on my Samsung Galaxy Note 8 with a otterbox box case
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cool gadget that really works to make your selfies look great. Works great as a flashlight too.
customer_reviews.author: APL

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: Wow, it didn't take long to be delivered, which I thought may be a problem now during this pandemic. Nice design. Fits well with my notebook PC however, for my mobile phone I have to take off the protective cover; but I am okay with that. The button for the power is also the same button to adjust the brightness. There are three settings for the dimmer and that works really good. There were a lot of ring lights to choose from and I am glad that I picked this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lamar

product_meta.title: Auxiwa Clip on Selfie Ring Light [Rechargeable Battery] with 36 LED for Smart Phone Camera Round Shape, White
feature_bullets: Look Flawless in Your Selfies: This little light is all about making your selfies best! The light gives soft illumination without harsh light. It’s like having a professional studio photographer whenever you feel the sudden urge to selfie.

Step Up Your Selfie Game: Photos are all about lighting! Using the flash that comes with cell phones is a big big no no. This is why you need this selfie ring light! Just clip it on your phone and you are on your way.

Make Your Life Easier: No more worry about replacing batteries; No more worry about finding the perfect lighting; No more worry about scratching of your devices as it is designed with scratch-resistant sponge which also prevents it from falling off.

Multi Usage, Work Amazing! You will be able to make videos at night or take great selfies in dark areas; you can use it with your rear camera to have high fidelity photos; you can also use it as torch,emergency light, making up light and even more!
Who hasn’t taken a selfie and ever said I wish I had more light? Well, this little camera ring was made for that.
